topic.title: How enable image in post for my zerotalk forum clone ?
topic.body: It's hardcoded in all.js , ![img](img.jpg) will turned in ![img](img.jpg). Could anyone tell me about enable this markup (image) ? thanks dude

thanks

topic.title: How make proxies survive ?
topic.body:
It's a disaster , many proxyes stops working after few days , too much files to fetching.
How about reset the cached file every 24 hours ?
It's frustrating seeing proxy slowdown e die ....

topic.title: what about a Zeronet proxy script in php ?
topic.body:
My zeronet blog have small users audience , lacks of reliables zeronet proxyes are the problem.....

A script in php for shared free hosting server with proxy functionality will be realistic in the future ?

1_1HtGfHk2MuqcB5nYXZ6b2NajXJLoxfq7XS.body:
> [nofish](#comment_976_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj): Search and remove line window.renderer = new Renderer(); from js/all.js (around line 1075)

Many thanks, you're great !

uhmm, do not work correctly, "missing content.json error" appear

what's wrong ?

> [nofish](#comment_978_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj): You have to sign the content of the site using the sidebar after you make any modification in the sourcecode.

do not work, maybe cloning zerotalk as is, is wrong. What about permission in content.json ?

I just tried and it's works finally: http://127.0.0.1:43110/16aToi59EwcSmA8pyEdKjAWFiep3tginsf/?Home

I've cloned your modified clone ;)

Could you put this mod as option in a config file ? Is usefull for me ...

thanks nofish.
Firefox request permission for pop-up , arghhh !

I tested this here:
http://127.0.0.1:43110/1B7mYTbNeVVKgjUywvpcCbkEmvj7AJYuRr

Any ideas for an easy return back to the blog ? Please, please?

1522102434_195Xafx3aZsxtngKo7D3XWgByQ5rY.body:
> [zeropyro](#comment_8_1KsFe6vgVpNFCNTQDQryrcQYySkAbFLXCV): The problem people are can not install programs like ZeroNet.If browser developpers integrate the decentralisated protocols in the browser (and they can seed the sites).Projects what include the integration will be popular.If the Zites can find the google search egnie and open the browser it will be a big breakthrough.Another way was a proxy server like TOR doo it.But this way the clearnet users never seed the zites.And this make problems.The popular programs will win this race and another will gone.The solution is a unified platform.No one can use countless platforms.One of the biggest is the Firefox,the Tor browser was firefox based.And the biggest anonymous network was TOR.In the long term, a common protocol will be the solution.The ZeroNet developpers can integrate a plugin in browser too what start the program when ZeroNet Start.And can add the program the Firefox and Tor browser too. [...]

* andregarzia â€¢ 2 months ago

Be aware that what has been implemented is not supported for dat, ipfs and scuttlebutt. What we have done is added those protocol schemes to a whitelist thus enabling developers to build add-ons to implement those protocols.*

1522352320_1C8aYoko2ccsGN96xqjCYvWV6jvMW.body: lacks working proxies making zeronet become darknet , stopping progress.... sic!

> [korfa](#comment_5_19s3iztHV7i3fBN9wyiMhiXECoZvyNjLhr): I see no big difference is ZeroNet in darknet or clearnet. For example now ZeroName has 663 seeders. That is a technical site. Some popular sites has 100 seeders, and how many readers? 0? what is the sense to host and renew site when there are no readers? And how can the project  bee developed being empty?

stop babbling. Having clearnet access do new user stream potentially could become zeronet peer and stable users.
My anime blog , in clearnet mode have minimun 50 new ip visiting. In darknet mode have 5 new ip visiting a days based...
